databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY_NUMBER , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NAME , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.SEND_FLAG , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.VESSEL_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.DATA_NO , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.USER_KEY , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.RENEW_DATE , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.TS FROM MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY.MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY_NUMBER

INSERT INTO MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY (MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY_NUMBER , CATEGORY_NAME , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES(:MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY_NUMBER , :CATEGORY_NAME , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY SET MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY_NUMBER = :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY_NUMBER, CATEGORY_NAME = :CATEGORY_NAME, SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID, DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY_NUMBER = :MS_VESSEL_ITEM_CATEGORY_NUMBER
